SEARCH
Package display.user

Class PharmacistDisplay

java.lang.Object
display.user.PharmacistDisplay
public class PharmacistDisplay extends Object
The PharmacistDisplay class provides the main interface for pharmacists in the Hospital Management System. It allows pharmacists to view and manage medication inventory, view appointment outcome records, update prescription statuses, and manage their profiles.

    • PharmacistDisplay

      public PharmacistDisplay()

  • Method Details

    • pharmacistDisplay

      public static void pharmacistDisplay(User user)
      Displays the pharmacist main page, with options to manage inventory, view records, and update profile settings.
      Parameters:
      user - the logged-in user, which must be of type Pharmacist.

    • viewMedInv

      public static void viewMedInv() throws utils.exceptions.PageBackException
      Displays the full medication inventory, allowing the pharmacist to view all available medications.
      Throws:
      utils.exceptions.PageBackException - if the user chooses to go back to the previous page.

    • viewLowMedicationInventory

      public static void viewLowMedicationInventory() throws utils.exceptions.PageBackException
      Displays the low-stock medication inventory, allowing the pharmacist to quickly identify medications needing replenishment.
      Throws:
      utils.exceptions.PageBackException - if the user chooses to go back to the previous page.

    • updatePrescriptionStatusDisplay

      public static void updatePrescriptionStatusDisplay(User user) throws utils.exceptions.PageBackException
      Displays the interface for updating the prescription status of a patient's diagnosis. The pharmacist can update the status to Pending, Dispensed, or Declined.
      Parameters:
      user - the logged-in pharmacist user.
      Throws:
      utils.exceptions.PageBackException - if the user chooses to go back to the previous page.

    • submitRequest

      public static void submitRequest(User user) throws utils.exceptions.PageBackException
      Displays the interface to submit a medication replenishment request for low stock or unavailable medications.
      Parameters:
      user - the logged-in pharmacist user.
      Throws:
      utils.exceptions.PageBackException - if the user chooses to go back to the previous page.
